We are extremely sorry for the inconvenience. We always strive to ensure the quality of the food we serve. And for that we can never compromise with the quality of the raw materials. And in recent times, the price of the raw materials has gone up significantly. For example, the price of Ground Beef has increased by more than 200 taka per kg in the past 14 months, which is what is reflected in the increase of 20 taka in the price of patty.
